speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
(Singing) It was a teenage wedding
and the old folks wished them well.
fr:
(Chantant) C'était
un mariage d'adolescents
											et leurs parents
leur souhaitaient le meilleur.
es:
(Cantando) Era una boda de adolescentes
y los viejos les deseaban lo mejor.
tr:
(Şarkı) İki gençti evlenen
yaşlılar mutluluk dilerken.
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
You could see that Pierre
did truly love the mademoiselle.
fr:
Vous pouviez voir que Pierre
aimait vraiment la demoiselle.
es:
Se veía a las claras que Pierre
realmente amaba a la mademoiselle.
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
Oh,
											and now the young monsieur and madame
											have rung the chapel bell.
fr:
Oh,
											et maintenant les jeunes
monsieur et madame
											ont sonné la cloche de la chapelle.
es:
Oh,
											y ahora el joven monsieur
y su joven madame
											han hecho sonar
la campana de la iglesia.
tr:
Ah,
											ve şimdi genç karı koca
											çalıyordu çanlarını şapelin.
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

es: "C'est la vie", dicen los viejos,

speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
it goes to show you never can tell.
											No, no.
fr:
cela montre qu'on ne sait jamais.
											Non, non.
es:
"eso demuestra que nunca se sabe".
											No, no.
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
They furnished off an apartment
with a two-room Roebuck sale.
fr:
Ils ont meublé un appartement
lors de soldes dans un magasin de meubles.
es:
Equiparon un dos ambientes
con muebles de rebaja.
tr:
İki odalı bir daire
dayadılar döşediler
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
The coolerator was crammed
with TV dinners and ginger ale.
											Oh,
											but when Pierre found work,
											the little money comin' worked out well .
fr:
Le frigo était plein de repas préparés
et de soda au gingembre.
											Oh,
											mais quand Pierre a trouvé du travail,
											la petite rentrée d'argent suffisait bien.
es:
El refrigerador a tope con comidas
preparadas y refresco de jengibre.
											Oh,
											pero cuando Pierre encontró trabajo,
											lo poco que ganaba les alcanzaba.
tr:
dolaba bira ve
abur cubur doldurup.
											Ah,
											ve Pierre bir iş buldu
											azdı parası ama yetiyordu onlara.

en:
They bought a souped-up jitney,
was a cherry red '53.
fr:
Ils ont acheté un taxi survolté
d'un rouge cerise datant de 53.
es:
Compraron una furgoneta tuneada,
color rojo cereza, del 53.
tr:
Modifiye bir araba aldılar
kiraz kırmızı, 53 model.
title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

title: "You Never Can Tell" / "Over the Mountain, Across the Sea"
speaker: Elise LeGrow

en:
They drove it down to New Orleans
to celebrate their anniversary.
											Oh,
											it was there where Pierre
											was wedded to the lovely mademoiselle.
fr:
Ils l'ont conduit
jusqu'à la Nouvelle-Orléans
											pour fêter leur anniversaire.
											Oh,
											c'est là que Pierre
											s'est marié à la belle demoiselle.
es:
Se fueron en ella a Nueva Orleans
a celebrar su aniversario.
											Oh,
											ahí fue donde Pierre
											se casó con la adorable mademoiselle.
tr:
Atlayıp gittiler New Orleans'a 
yıl dönümü kutlamaya.
											Ah,
											Orada evlenmişti Pierre
											sevimli küçük hanımla.

en:
I recently had the tremendous opportunity
of searching for gold
											in the vast mine of songs
released by Chess Records,
											a Chicago-based label that was really
very active in the '50s and '60s in the US
											and that music spread all over the world.
											And the songs that I'm singing tonight
											are from an album that I just put out
called, "Playing Chess,"
											that pays homage to those songs.
											And these guys were really the innovators
of rock 'n' roll and soul and R&B
											as we now know it.
fr:
J'ai récemment eu la chance unique
de chercher de l'or
											dans l'immense mine de chansons
produites par Chess Records,
											un label basé à Chicago très actif
dans les années 50 et 60 aux États-Unis
											et cette musique a été diffusée
à travers le monde.
											Les chansons que je chante ce soir
											sont tirées d'un album que je viens
de sortir qui s'appelle « Playing Chess »
											et qui rend hommage à ces chansons.
											Ces gens étaient les innovateurs
du rock 'n' roll, de la soul et du R&B
											tels que nous les connaissons.
es:
Hace poco tuve la gran oportunidad
de hurgar en la inmensa mina de oro
											que es la colección de canciones
publicadas por Chess Records,
											una compañía discográfica de Chicago,
muy activa en los 50 y los 60 en EE. UU.
											Esa música circuló por todo el mundo.
											Los temas que voy a cantar esta noche
											pertenecen a "Playing Chess",
el álbum que acabo de lanzar
											y que le rinde homenaje a esas canciones.
											Estos músicos realmente inventaron
el rocanrol, el soul y el R&B
											tal como los conocemos hoy.
tr:
Geçenlerde altın madeni
gibi büyük bir fırsat yakaladım,
											Chess Records tarafından 
çıkarılmış şarkıları araştırdım,
											Şikago'da bulunan bir firma
ve ABD'de 50'ler ve 60'larda çok faaldi
											ve o müzik tüm dünyaya yayıldı.
											Bu gece söylediğim şarkılar
											"Playing Chess" adını verdiğim albümden
											o şarkılara bir saygı olarak.
											Bu adamlar rock'n roll ve soul 
ve R&B'nin yaratıcıları,
											bildiğiniz gibi.
